name: Braves on the run
description:
Description
This is a casual side scrolling game, where the player controls a clumsy Vicking who consider himself the King of pillages.
But this time it won't be that easy. 
Run back to the safety of your homeland collecting most of the gold you can get.

Controls:

  • Left Mouse Button - Walk
  • Right Mouse Button - Jump/Atack
  • "Nothing" - Block

Links:

  • Presskit
  • Boanergesgames
